title: BackgroundDownloadProgress.TotalBytesToReceive is always zero in Build 1903
body: When using the BackgroundTransfer API in Windows 10 Build 1903, BackgroundDownloadProgress.TotalBytesToReceive is always zero.

comments.body: I am having same issue. Any update about the fix?.
Thank you David. Do you have any indication of the fix timeframe and how it will be released?
Thanks for the report. We are aware of the issue and are working on a fix.
We were wondering why our progress bar values were suddenly all wrong. Thanks Matthew Richardson.
